item.title: 1. Synthetics Dashboard
item.description: Goto Synthetics Your instructor will highlight which Synthetic test to use Click on the test Note: be aware of screenshot for this step Change to last hour So far we have tested the performance of our Website by visiting and running manual test scenarios to see how our website performed. However, this is not something you can/want to do 24 hours a day, 7 days a week! However, if you are not constantly testing your website performance & behavior in production, the likely source telling you that your site is slow or not performant would be via Social Media or Down Detector.

item.title: 2. Synthetics Test Detail
item.description: Deep dive into a datapoint must be successful and long run duration Walk through, screenshots, video and highlight Synthetic vs RUM Web Vitals, Business Transactions, Waterfall, etc. 5 steps/business trans We know there is an issue placing orders, so click on place Order Find POST checkout and click APM link

item.title: 3. Synthetics to APM
item.description: You are in an APM trace view Validate you see errors Click on related content log link Repeat the exercise to filter down to errors only View the error log to validate the failed payment due to invalid Token.

item.title: 4. Synthetics Detector
item.description: Go back to Synthetics and select the test again and click create detector Ensure Run Duration is selected and static threshold Set trigger threshold to be 30000ms, leave the rest as default Click Activate Let’s go back to our War Room dashboard
